snippet: WURTH--Marjorie. Beloved wife to Herbert, mother to William and Laurel, sister to Carol, grandmother and aunt. Marge was a fashion writer who charmed the world with her dry, brilliant wit. Love. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WURTH--Marjorie. Beloved wife to Herbert, mother to William and Laurel, sister to Carol, grandmother and aunt. Marge was a fashion writer who charmed the world with her dry, brilliant wit. Love. 1/3
